Key Match Events: Aaron Judge broke the game wide open with his first home run of the postseason.
Gleyber Torres scored after a pop fly ricocheted off Brayan Rocchio's glove.
Clay Holmes struck out Austin Hedges to keep the Yankees ahead.
Jazz Chisholm Jr. was picked off to snuff out his leadoff double in the sixth.
Anthony Rizzo got caught in a clumsy rundown to end the inning.
Post-Match Reflections: Aaron Judge expressed the importance of moving on to the next game despite the win.
Stephen Vogt explained the aggressive moves made during the game and their outcomes.
Aaron Boone emphasized the importance of being aggressive in certain situations.
